post.title: Extension Method for Wpf Window with Froms Owner
post.description: Windows Forms WPF extension method for setting owner
post.content:
Extension Method

[code:c#]

internal static class InteropExtensions
{
    public static bool? ShowDialog(this System.Windows.Window win, IntPtr handle)
    {
        WindowInteropHelper helper = new WindowInteropHelper(win);
        helper.Owner = handle;
        return win.ShowDialog();
    }
}

[/code]

 

Usage

[code:c#]

var win = new WpfWindow();
win.ShowDalog(windowsFormOwnerHandle);

[/code]
